column4: hi guys..I've just installed chrome, and I opted to use the gtk theme for it...can anyone tell me why it's purple?  I dont have a stitch of purple in my gtk theme?
mm  not sure did you restart chrome?
Imagination has transition effects I believe
would there be a way via, say, daap?
is daap plugin enabled in rythmbox?
mmm let me check hold on
is this from a mac to linux you want to do this?
yessir - from my mac min running itunes 9 to Ubuntu 10.04
what you might want to try is to set up  "SharePoints"  on the mac to set up the share of itunes flder and then set the library location in rhythmbox  to the share
you might have to "update" the shared folder  before it can be accessed by ubuntu rhythmbox
will give that a go...I'd love to get daap working, but I think itunes still blocks outgoing daap
` also in google  ...the search string  to use would be   rhythmbox daap itunes
